title: This Regulation shall apply to the heritage listas shall be notified by GoM from time to time (hereinafter referred to as Listed Heritage Buildings/Structures/Precincts/Sites) and to any draft Heritage List (s) as published by the GoM
clause_text: This Regulation shall apply to the heritage listas shall be notified by GoM from time to time (hereinafter referred to as Listed Heritage Buildings/Structures/Precincts/Sites) and to any draft Heritage List (s) as published by the GoM. /Municipal Commissioner.
